casebody.data:
[Cite as 12/31/2002 Case Announcements, 2002-0hio-7301.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

December 31, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-1604. State v. Jackson.

Allen C.P. No. CR20020011. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution of sentence pending disposition of this appeal,

IT IS ORDERED that the motion be, and hereby is, granted, pending further order of this court.
